column1: Little Goat Diner////I had the cuban breakfast sandwich
column2: which was the special of the day. I wasn't blown away by it
column3: but it was pretty delicious. Enough so that I want to come back and try more items. There are a lot of options for breakfast
column4: and time and care is put into preparing your meal
column5: so everything looks fancy when it comes out. For that reason
column6: it's a little pricey for a breakfast diner
column7: so I think of this place as more of a special occasion breakfast than anything else.
